TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Saml2Id extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the identifier used for SAML assertions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the element that this class represents, see the SAML V2.0 Core specification.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a system-generated value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ID is created based on a generated GUID and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id.Value%2A> property is set accordingly.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The identifier should be unique per [Saml2Core, 1.3.4] and must fit the NCName xml schema definition, that is, it must begin with a letter or underscore.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed

Docs.param: The object with which to compare this instance.
Docs.summary: Determines whether this instance is equal to the specified object.
Docs.returns: if the objects are equal; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks For the objects to be equal, the specified object must be an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id> class and its <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id.Value%2A> property must be equal to the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2Id.Value%2A> property of this instance as determined by a string comparison.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 GetHashCode() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a hash code for this instance.
Docs.returns: An integer that contains the hash code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string ToString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a string representation of this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The identifier should be unique per [Saml2Core, 1.3.4] and must fit the NCName xml schema definition, that is, it must begin with a letter or underscore.
